document.full_text: an arizona sheriff has turned over documents sought by the u.s. justice department in a probe of whether his police force discriminated against hispanics in a crackdown on illegal immigrants, the agency said on thursday.
document.title: sheriff hands over documents in u.s. bias probe
lines_and_colors: an arizona sheriff has turned over documents sought by the u.s. justice department in a probe of whether his police force discriminated against hispanics in a crackdown on illegal immigrants, the agency said on thursday.
